ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: video cards
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually its only the ATI Radeon 9000.  It s a 128MB DDR 2X/4X AGP.  There is, however, a step up from it.  The ATI Radeon 9700 which is a 128MB DDR 8X AGP
ygData.messageBody:
Actually its only the ATI Radeon 9000.  It's a 128MB DDR 2X/4X AGP.  There is, however, a step up from it.  The ATI Radeon 9700 which is a 128MB DDR 8X AGP card.  It's $150 more though.  And being 8X does not fit the form factor for my PIII motherboard.  So essentially I bought the best card I could for my system.  I imagine after I upgrade to a 1.2Ghz PIII CPU that EverQuest should have no problems at all.
 
and I do run Win ME.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: LAINE. Mikael (Nol)
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Friday, January 10, 2003 6:23 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: video cards

No shit =P Your graphic card beats all released cards from GeForce =P GeForce FX will be better tho.
-----Original Message-----
From: Wulfric Rennison [mailto:wulftech@...]
Sent: den 9 januari 2003 21:29
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: video cards

I am running EverQuest on a PIII 800mhz with 1GB of RAM and a ATI Radeon 128MB 4X AGP video card.    I never saw any lag on my system pre-Luclin.  It's only when they souped up the game engine for better graphics that my system started lagging.  Thus the upgrade to more RAM and a better video card.  Now I run on a cable modem.  There's virtually no lag on zones that existed prior to Luclin.  There is still lag on Luclin, but I can turn the clip plane down to nil and turn off spell effects (which are annoying anyway) and get almost no lag at all.   However, same system specs with a 64MB video card and  was getting major lag in Bazaar.  Now it's pretty smoothe.  I plan on upgrading the processor to a 1Ghz or better next month so I am sure even Bazaar will be fine.
 
I still contend that a higher end video card can compensate for a low end processor.  But when you've got both together, EQ should be flawless. 
 
Wulfric/Raido/Celric/Shifu/Sandahl/Savawulf/Ramsen         Cazic Thule Server
Pseudowulf        The Seventh Hammer Server
Kenjite/Petrus        Tunare Server
